title: Ep. 720 - Social Justice Warriors at the Pentagon
description:
A military leader attacks a conservative journalist for suggesting that pregnant women don’t make great soldiers, Tom Cotton turns a libs’ racial attack against her, and a leftist comedienne rips the Democrat Party.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
